Title: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF ONE THOUSAND PESOS TO BE DISBURSED UNDER THE DIRECTION OF THE CHIEF OF THE EXECUTIVE BUREAU FOR THE ACQUISITION AND TEST OF A VOTING MACHINE
Data:
[ Act No. 3286, December 01, 1926 ]
AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF ONE THOUSAND PESOS TO BE DISBURSED UNDER THE DIRECTION OF THE CHIEF OF THE EXECUTIVE BUREAU FOR THE ACQUISITION AND TEST OF A VOTING MACHINE
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. There is hereby appropriated, out of any funds in the Insular Treasury not otherwise set aside, the sum of one thousand pesos, to be disbursed, under the direction of the Chief of the Executive Bureau, for the acquisition and test of a model voting machine invented by Martiniano Floro.ℒαwρhi৷ After the test, the model machine shall be ceded to the Philippine Museum, and any unexpended balance of this appropriation shall revert to the general funds of the Insular Treasury.
Section 2. On or before the sixteenth of July, nineteen hundred and twenty-seven, the Chief of the Executive Bureau shall submit a report to the Legislature on the advisability of adopting said machine in the elections.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, December 1, 1926.
